text:
Bruce Gray (September 7, 1936 – December 13, 2017) was a Puerto Rican-born Canadian actor.
Gray was probably best known as investment banker Adam Cunningham on the Global series "Traders", the father of the groom in "My Big Fat Greek Wedding", as Judge J.E. Reilly on the soap opera "Passions" and the ghost of Joe's father on the hit television show "Medium".
Gray died on December 13, 2017 of brain cancer in Los Angeles, California at the age of 81.
